# Copilot OS Instructions

Generated from Antigravity on 2026-01-29.

## Always follow
1. Plan before coding.
2. Make small, reviewable changes.
3. Add/update tests when behavior changes.
4. Perform a self-review before finishing.

## Repo AI Structure
- Rules (detailed):  
- `.github/rules/rules-design-ui.md`
- `.github/rules/rules-architecture.md`
- `.github/rules/rules-agent-core.md`
- `.github/rules/rules-soft-clean-code.md`
- `.github/rules/rules-soft-patterns.md`
- `.github/rules/rules-tech-typescript.md`
- `.github/rules/rules-tech-react.md`
- `.github/rules/rules-soft-git.md`
- `.github/rules/rules-agent-memory.md`
- `.github/rules/rules-tech-golang.md`

- Memory (decisions & lessons):  
`.github/memory.md`

- Prompt Library (skills + workflows):  
`.github/prompts/`

## Behavior model
When asked to act as Planner, Reviewer, Nexus, Task Manager, etc., use the matching prompt file in `.github/prompts/`.

Do not ignore the rules.
